name: Poison from the lab
description:
In this game you play as a poison that was created in experiments in the laboratory, in the laboratory you will face many difficulties such as people, drones, abysses, crystals, walking around the laboratory you have to kill people and find a way out to kill all living things!

Controls:

W/a/s/d - move

Enter - dash

Creators:

NxhzGames - code

Mr ying - art

Flopter - music
